title: Astronauts, Family Trees and Drips
teaser: A special live event from Cooper Union, Andrew Solomon describes his circuitous route to becoming a dad; astronaut Michael J. Massimino details his high stakes mission to repair the Hubble Space Telescope; and a cellist makes a disturbing discovery about a neighbor.  Hosted by Jay Allison.
contentencoded:
Andrew Solomon becomes a family man, despite some challenges.
 
Michael J. Massimino is an NASA astronaut who services The Hubble Space Telescope.
 
Marika Hughes  finds herself surrounded by death in a Brooklyn apartment.
